name: market for plaster mixing | plaster mixing | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7636/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'plaster mixing', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;The service "plaster mixing" represents the mixing of 1 kg of ready-mixed plaster. The plaster mixing process includes only the energy (electricity) for the operation and the equipment.  Therefore the raw materials as for example cement, hydraulic and/or hydrated lime and water must be added.

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster
